participant_1.background:
I can't do a lot of things that other people can do because I'm in a wheelchair, but I try to stay positive and make the best of my situation.
my daughters say i am a great mother.
I love wearing clothes that make me feel like I can take on the world.
i used to wear a cape.
I love to grow sunflowers.

participant_2.background:
I put on my favorite pair of jeans made from recycled plastic bottles.
I enjoy playing soccer with my nieces and nephews.
I like to go to YouTube to watch funny videos with my nephews.
i wait tables.
i own two boxer dogs.

content.text: Hey, I love YouTube as well! What videos do you enjoy watching?
I love watching funny videos with my nephews!
That sounds like a lot of fun! What are some of your favorite videos?
I love watching videos of cats doing funny things! And I also like watching videos of people doing stupid things.
Cats are so funny! I have a cat named Mittens and she's always getting into trouble.
That's so cute! I love cats! I have two boxer dogs, but I would love to have a cat someday.
Boxer dogs are great dogs! I love their big personalities.
Yeah, they're the best! So, what do you do for a living?
I'm a stay-at-home mom, but I used to work as a teacher.
Oh, that's cool! I'm a waitress.
That's a tough job! But I'm sure you're great at it.
Thanks! I do my best. So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to spend time with my family, I love to garden, and I love to read.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love to spend time with my family as well. We love to go on picnics and play games.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love to go on picnics too. I love to eat outside!
Me too! I love to eat all kinds of food, but my favorite food is pizza.
Pizza is my favorite food too! I love pizza with pepperoni and olives.
That's my favorite kind of pizza too! I love the combination of the salty pepperoni and the salty olives.
Me too! It's the perfect combination.
I'm glad we agree!
Me too!
